subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Slovakia upset the Russians 2-1 in a game that was fast, physical and, if you didn’t mind the absence of goals-scoring, the most thrilling of the tournament so far.
snippet: Slovakia upset the Russians 2-1 in a game that was fast, physical and, if you didn’t mind the absence of goals-scoring, the most thrilling of the tournament so far.
